name: Wandering Spirit
description:
Welcome... You are a spirit wandering through the underground. Your goal is to collect mana orbs to stay alive. As you collect the mana orbs, watch out for hollow spirits that will chase you and try to consume you. Have fun!

Controls 

Your character moves towards your mouse.

Hold Space Bar to move faster. This will also increase your energy consumption.

Press escape to pause.

Hi guys! This is my first game jam, and I wanted to create a simple 2D game. Through this project, I learnt many new things such as 2D lighting and trail effects. I hope you enjoy the game!

-RandomLB
